main: ^Hey Lemon, would you feel up to spar with me?
^Huh? You wanna fight me? Right here? Right now??
^... I thought you'd never ask! I'd be honored!
^Great! Even when resting it's good to keep the mind and body ready for action.
^(I can't believe I've been challenged to a one on one duel by Apple of all people, I'm freaking out!!!)
^Hey Apple! Before the fight I just want to ask you, don't hold back! If I'm going to beat you I want to beat you for real!
^Sure thing Lemon! (ah geez they're getting real excited about this)
good: ^Its a close match, but eventually Lemon has to tap
^*wheeze* sorry bud... yous said... *wheeze* not to hold back
^What are you apologizing for? That was awesome! You kicked my butt!
^Hey, you made me work for it!
^I know I got a lot to learn, but I'm glad I got you as a teacher
bad: ^Not putting in 100%, Apple lets Lemon win
^That was a good fight Lemon! You really handed it to me at the end there!
^Yeah. Thanks for the match Apple, it was fun.
^You've really improved since being on the team, and I'm really proud of you.
^... Sure. Thanks Apple, it means a lot.
